item.title: Live Updates: Israel Carries Out Another Round of Strikes Near Lebanese Capital
item.description: The attacks followed claims from the Israeli military that Hezbollah was operating a command center beneath a hospital in a densely populated neighborhood near Beirut in which it holds sway. The Israeli military issued evacuation warnings for other buildings in the neighborhood, and deafening explosions were later heard.

item.title: Israeli airstrikes hit near Beirut hospital
